item.title: On Travelling: I’m Fed Up Because it’s all the Same.
item.description: She looked at my passport and flipped, and flipped, and flipped, and flipped. “Wow, you’ve been to a lot of places,” she said with fully disclosed jealousy. Which at first I thought was odd. Four years ago her accent alone would have seemed exotic, enticing, other. Now she appeared to be just another worker trying to get by. I glanced up from my Twitter scanning on my mobile and said without a pause the above reflection may suggest, “yeah, I’ve been to lots of the world’s shit holes.
